long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to easily look up word definitions and pronunciations directly from any webpage. By right-clicking on any word, users can instantly add it to their personal word list and view its definition. Additionally, users can play the word's pronunciation with a simple click. The extension also saves the word list so that users can access it at any time, even after restarting the browser.
